name: Coffeetime Crosswords
description: Single Player, Local Multiplayer 1-2, HD (High Definition). Prepare for the ultimate crossword challenge and get the full version of Coffeetime Crosswords™. Featuring more than 150 puzzles, created by Penny Press, it will test your skill and mental prowess at crosswords. Play together with a friend in co-op mode and help each other solve the crosswords. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/Live/accounts.
